Package com.ABCjobs.communityportal.ABCJobsPteLtd.services.security

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IAuthenticationFacade
    IAuthenticationFacade --- abstracts the method for retrieving current authenticated user See implementation at AuthenticationFacade
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuthenticationFacade
    AuthenticationFacade --- implements the method of IAuthenticationFacade
    LoginErrorHandler
    LoginErrorHandler --- class that implements AuthenticationFailureHandler for handling invalid authentication
    PasswordConfig  
    RolesHandler
    RolesHandler --- extends AuthenticationSuccessHandler for handling any successful authentication
    UserDetailsServiceUsers
    UserDetailsServiceUsers --- implements UserDetailsService for creating new user for spring security from database
    UserPrincipals
    UserPrincipals --- implements UserDetails interface for assigning of roles for different access method for different types of users
    WebSecurity
    WebSecurity --- Configuration of spring security to be implemented in the web application
